> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_11_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): Curious from where this craze and consumption lifestyle comes

People easily blame people about the collapsing world. 
But the fact is that a small group of leaders at the top above people always has been responsible for every catastrophic disaster from the beginning of the history up to the present day. 
As you mentioned people are born to be stupid like babies, that's why the leaders are the key factor of every astonishing event in history. Because they simply lead the stupid crowd.
Who was the leader when America was peaceful and wealthy? 
Who was the leader when America was in non-responsible wars and Americans were poor?
Who was the leader when Mongolians conquered the world? 
Who was the leader when Mongolians lost the mainland China?
Who is those leaders' leader? Who is ruling the entire world? 

John 12:31 The time for judging this world has come, when Satan, the ruler of this world, will be cast out.

Jesus clearly mentioned who was/is the ruler of this world. Satan. 

Korean people had had legendary righteous and genius kings in history, such as King Sejong or King Jeongjo.
What is the problem with them? They get old, sick and die at last. And their shitty sons and grandsons rule the country and destroy everything. Entire world has been doing this stupid repeating games for thousands of years!

All we need is nothing but a leader who is righteous and smart, and does not get old nor die, but live forever. 
He will rule the world forever. 

This is the only solution for the current doomed world. 
The present ruler will never stop destroying the environment and leading people to the doom, just like a serial killer never stops killing the victims.
